briefdescription.para: Audio instance is owned by FormRepresentation There is zero or one Audio instance per FormRepresentation.
Pointers to an existing Speaker There is zero to many pointers per FormRepresentation instance.

detaileddescription.para:
FormRepresentation instances are owned by Form.
A FormRepresentation instance.

simplesect.para: FormRepresentation private attribute '__speaker', a Python list of Speaker instances.

parameterdescription.para: Script used for the written form.
If this argument is given, get written form only if written using this script.
Type of variant, in range 'type_variant_range' defined in 'common/range.py'.
If this argument is given, get comment only if written in this language.

briefdescription.para: Get the audio resource maintained by the form representation.

detaileddescription.para:
Attributes 'mediaType', 'fileName', 'author', 'quality', 'startPosition', 'durationOfEffectiveSpeech', 'externalReference', 'audioFileFormat' are owned by Material/Audio.
media_type
The media type to set.
file_name
Name of the audio file.
author
Author of the recording.
quality
Quality of the recording, in range 'quality_range' defined in 'common/range.py'.
start_position
Start position of the form in the recording, in format 'Thh:mm:ss,msms', e.g. "T00:05:00".
duration
Duration of the effcetive speech, in format 'PThhHmmMssS', e.g. "PT00:05:00".
external_reference
Reference of the audio file, if not directly provided.
audio_file_format
Format of the audio file, e.g. "wav".
FormRepresentation instance.

briefdescription.para: "Form Representation is a class representing one variant orthography of a Form." (LMF)
